app.title: AI Voice Chat Bot: Open Wisdom
app.description:
AI Voice Chat: Open Wisdom app is an AI (artificial intelligence) bot which is powered by OpenAI o1 & ChatGPT4o technology & will answer any of your questions using natural language processing (NLP)
There is no need to login to the chat.

This A.I. Voice Chat Artificial (Using OpenAI o1) intelligence app can be used to openly plan trips, AI chat to openly getting useful tips about life, suggest recipes, or can even demonstrate knowledge of historical facts and science or be your own virtual assistant with the help of natural language processing, without login.

An open artificial intelligence chat (ChatGPT4o powered) virtual assistant could save you precious time and efforts in day to day tasks by answering clearly and directly.
We are using advanced chat natural language processing algorithms (Powered by ChatGPT4o) to bring you an easy and intuitive chat interface to interact with the voice chat app which can function as your virtual assistant
Virtual A.I. Chat app (using ChatGPT4o and OpenAI o1) is taking the lead of the artificial intelligence natural language processing technology nowadays.

A.I. Voice Chat is based on subscriptions - the initial credits are completely free!

app.summary: (Powered by ChatGPT4o & OpenAI o1) Artificial Intelligence Virtual Assistant

reviews.text: My only complaint is that there aren't different audible voices to choose from. There is just the one higher pitched female voice. I understand that chatbots can't remember past conversations, so that really takes away from the experience, but that is not the fault of the developer. The technology just doesn't exist yet, at least not affordably. This is the best app of this type that I have found, and I tried at least 7. Lost count after that.

This app is soooooooo amazing! I love that it reads out loud üîä to me. I have been using it for the past few days for business purposes, and it has impressed me at the level of accuracy, and additional information that I was not aware of. I highly recommend this app, especially if you have any disabilities like photophobia, dyslexia, etc. I wish the makers of this product much success and prosperity. Blessed be üôèüèº ‚ö° üåç ü•∞

Great voice recognition and information available. Large possibilities from this app. The AI can read back the information. One improvement would be able to select an AI voice, (ideally could voice as anyone such as your favourite movie star, or perhaps you could play it some of your own voice by reading a transcript, and the reading could be some kind of synthesis of that). Highly recommend.
reviews.replyText: Thank you Phill, with the latest update, you can now go to the options screen and choose your preferred voice.

reviews.text: I appreciate that you guys are trying. We need to have a conversational voice chatGPT. A couple of things though. I want for it to be able to listen to an audio queue and then have a normal conversation with me. I also want it to function regardless of what else is on my screen. I'd like it to function almost as a human would and be an AI friend that I could have chats with while driving down the road (without having to press a button to prompt it)

Tried *many* talking bots. This is my choice. Support people are good. I am using google speech recognition and synthesys engine which has nice and clear accent. Its not expensive. Needs tiny improvements (when my subscription ends, export chats, voice activation...) . 4-5 stars. Well done. I learn french with it, automatic all translate and pronounces sentences I need. Awesome. I also use T2S. 2 software fir all i need in my life for Languages training.
reviews.replyText: Thank you for the wonderful 5-star review! We're thrilled that our app is your top choice and that you're enjoying the features like Google speech recognition and translation. We're always working on improvements and appreciate your feedback. Happy language learning!

reviews.text: Reviews-reply state that voice choice options are available in the newest update. But nothing can be found in the app. The Ai replies: "as an AI assistant, I don't have an interface or options menu for you to choose a voice directly within this conversation. The voice you are hearing is determined by the platform or app you are using to interact with me. I would recommend checking the settings or preferences within the specific app or platform on your Android device to.."
reviews.replyText: Hi Logfire, you simply need to click on the settings icon on the top right corner, and choose you voice.

reviews.text: Love this app....my first review of any app ever ....it helped me to reach higher levels in producing without paying for courses or watching tutorials ...sometimes it makes mistakes but hardly ever.I found it important how you ask a question to get the most accurate response...all round it really worked for Me and that's more you can say for a lot of gimmick apps now days

Careful it's a money grab, quick about it too, sure it seemed nice at first but you only get like 6 free interactions then it blocks itself from talking to you unless ya pay them for a subscription damn all that didn't appear to have many options in it either, seem better free apps of this nature with better options and customizations that ain't botherede for money yet which is cool cause I don't have any money anyway haha

The microphone üéôÔ∏è button didn't work on my device and it can't really search the internet. Also, the ads play on top of AI voice... The answers are clear and witty, however (in the cynical mode which is quite brilliant üëçüèº).

I Absolutely LOVE the way you can change the AI's characteristics! But Very Sad that I do not have the money to buy the upgrade an now I am not able to use it anymore üò¢ üòû. Should have a simple mode with limited questions per day. Also I had to actually correct an answer I received. I was apologized to an then explained the correct reason.

app.AIReview:
AI Voice Chat Bot: Open Wisdom ‚Äì A Review

Overview

AI Voice Chat Bot: Open Wisdom, currently boasting over 2.97 million installs and a solid 4.38 rating, presents itself as an accessible entry point into the world of conversational AI powered by OpenAI‚Äôs cutting-edge technologies, specifically ChatGPT4o and OpenAI o1. The app's core premise is simple: a voice-enabled AI assistant ready to answer questions, generate ideas, and generally act as a versatile virtual companion ‚Äì all without requiring a login. Given the popularity of similar apps leveraging these same underlying models, understanding Open Wisdom‚Äôs performance and value proposition is crucial for potential users. The app's free price point further amplifies its appeal, making it an attractive option for those curious about AI-driven assistance.

Key Features

  • Voice-Activated Interaction: At the heart of the app lies its voice interaction capabilities. Users can simply speak their queries and receive responses from the AI bot in real-time. This is a core differentiator compared to text-based chatbots, offering a more natural and intuitive conversational experience.
  • Powered by OpenAI o1 & ChatGPT4o: The app explicitly highlights its reliance on these powerful language models. This immediately establishes a level of sophistication and suggests the potential for generating high-quality, nuanced responses ‚Äì a key selling point in a crowded market.
  • Broad Range of Applications: Open Wisdom isn‚Äôt limited to simple Q&A. The description outlines several use cases including trip planning (‚Äúopenly plan trips‚Äù), life advice ("AI chat to openly getting useful tips about life"), recipe suggestions, historical fact retrieval and scientific explanations, and general virtual assistance duties.
  • No Login Required: A significant advantage for users seeking immediate access without the friction of account creation or data sharing. This simplifies the onboarding process considerably.
  • Natural Language Processing (NLP): The app‚Äôs core functionality relies on NLP technology enabling the AI to understand and respond to user queries in a natural, human-like manner.

Strengths

  • Accessibility & Cost: The biggest strength is undoubtedly its free price point. Many sophisticated AI chatbots require subscriptions or premium features, making Open Wisdom an extremely accessible option for anyone wanting to experiment with conversational AI.
  • Ease of Use: The lack of a login requirement dramatically simplifies the user experience. Users can immediately start interacting with the bot simply by opening the app and speaking their query.
  • Leveraging Leading Technology: Utilizing ChatGPT4o and OpenAI o1 provides a solid foundation for generating intelligent and potentially insightful responses. The underlying technology is demonstrably powerful, providing users with access to what‚Äôs currently considered state-of-the-art AI.
  • Versatile Applications: The breadth of potential uses ‚Äì from travel planning to scientific inquiries ‚Äì suggests the bot has the capacity to be a genuinely useful tool across various domains.

Areas for Improvement

  • Response Quality Variability: While powered by top-tier technology, like many open AI models, response quality can fluctuate. The app's description doesn‚Äôt address how frequently users encounter inaccurate, irrelevant, or nonsensical responses. This is a common challenge with these models and needs to be acknowledged transparently.
  • Lack of Contextual Memory: Without a login system, the bot likely lacks persistent memory of past conversations. This severely limits its usefulness for complex tasks that require building upon previous interactions. A simple history feature would greatly enhance usability.
  • Limited Control & Customization: The app appears to offer no user controls over the AI‚Äôs behavior or response style. Users are entirely reliant on the bot's default settings, which may not align with individual preferences.
  • No Error Handling/Fallback Mechanisms: The review doesn't state how the app handles situations where it cannot understand a query or generate a suitable response. A clear fallback mechanism (e.g., offering alternative suggestions) would improve user satisfaction.

User Experience

The initial impression of Open Wisdom is positive. The interface is clean, simple and intuitive for its core function ‚Äì initiating voice conversations. However, the experience quickly becomes dependent on the performance of the underlying AI engine. When the bot delivers a coherent and relevant response, the interaction feels surprisingly natural and engaging. Conversely, when the responses are weak or off-topic, the user experience suffers considerably. The absence of any visual feedback (e.g., loading indicators) during processing can exacerbate this frustration, leaving users unsure if the bot is actively working on their request. A smoother user interface could significantly enhance the overall enjoyment and effectiveness of the app.

Value for Money

As a free application, Open Wisdom offers exceptional value for money. The access to OpenAI's advanced technology without any cost barrier makes it an attractive option for casual users or those simply wanting to explore AI capabilities. However, it‚Äôs crucial to recognize that this is a demo of the technology rather than a fully-fledged virtual assistant. Users should view it as a stepping stone toward more robust and feature-rich AI assistants‚Äîpotentially leading them to consider paid subscriptions in the future if they find the technology genuinely valuable.

Conclusion

AI Voice Chat Bot: Open Wisdom represents an exciting, albeit somewhat raw, entry point into conversational AI. Leveraging the power of ChatGPT4o and OpenAI o1, it provides a surprisingly accessible way for users to experiment with this transformative technology. While response quality can vary, and certain limitations exist due to the lack of persistent memory and customization options, the app‚Äôs free price tag and ease of use make it a worthwhile download for anyone curious about AI's potential. The key will be whether Open Wisdom can evolve beyond its current state by addressing areas for improvement ‚Äì particularly around response consistency and adding basic contextual awareness ‚Äì to truly deliver on the promise of a powerful and versatile virtual assistant.
